text: Sirkka Turkka (2 February 1939 - 23 October 2021) was a Finnish poet. She won the Finlandia Prize in 1987 and the Eino Leino Prize in 2000. Kustantajat.fi Turkka died on 23 October 2021 at the age of 82. ==References== Category:Finnish poets Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths
title: Sirkka Turkka
